page.title: 07EDUCATION SEAHOUSES
page.content:
The children of Seahouses are educated within the village up to the age of thirteen when they go to the Duchess's High School at Alnwick.
PLAY SCHOOL. This meets two mornings per week and is held in the Youth Block at the Middle School and caters for a maximum of 25.
FIRST SCHOOL. Children attend this school for five years from the year in which their fifth birthday occurs. At the present there are 5 staff and 105 pupils.
MIDDLE SCHOOL. Children spend four years at this school before going on to Alnwick. There are 8 staff and 135 pupils at present.
